definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Various methods measuring canine femoral neck anteversion have been proposed in literatures.
sentences.chinese: 过去的文献中有许多量测股骨前倾角的方法。

sentences.english: Using the ASTM indicators, measure the thickness of both lites of glass in the IG assembly.
sentences.chinese: 使用ASTM指示时，量测双面复层玻璃的厚度。

sentences.english: The sundial's nocturnal counterpart, the water clock, was designed to measure temporal hours at night.
sentences.chinese: 到了晚上，则用水钟取代日晷，量测晚上的真时。

sentences.english: Monitoring and measurement are necessary procedures in the design and construction of tunnel when using new Austrian tunneling method(NATM).
sentences.chinese: 监控量测是隧道新奥法设计与施工中必不可少的环节。

sentences.english: The present results have demonstrated that PRN also plays an inhibitory role in a variety of behavioral functions.
sentences.chinese: 目前实验结果证实其对多种行为量测也有抑制的作用。

sentences.english: So tunnel monitoring measurment is the foundation and prerequisite of tunneling with NATM in.
sentences.chinese: 因此，隧道监控量测是新奥法隧道施工的基础和前提。

definition: to stake out (the boundaries of a property etc)/to demarcate/(engineering etc) to calibrate
to interpret (a visual document, a medical exam, an historical event etc)/to analyze data (from a chip, a black box etc)
